nodes.bodyText: Should we use Collator.getInstance(Locale)  ? Otherwise this will use local machine or JVM default which might not be what we expect. I guess en_US would be safe choice.
good point, yeah I wasn't too sure which one to pin it to if I did. There's also Locale.ROOT, Locale.US and Locale.ENGLISH
Javadoc of Locale.ROOT looks promising - I'd give that a try. If that doesn't work Locale.US.
